metadata.name: Iggy Pop
metadata.description: It’s Tuesday, June 13th, 1978. I rock up to the Music Machine Camden Town London as usual with a borrowed Nikon F and the lens that I definitely couldn't afford but I bought anyway... I know a little about Iggy Pop but I wasn't sure what to expect... What happened next was mind-blowing and is a historical fact. This is frame 8 from roll 1 and it has been specifically scanned for this NFT and has never previously been printed or published. Photo ©David Levine
